name: DESIGN YOUR OWN  Bridesmaids Clutch Set of 6 Custom Handmade Large Pouch Flat Bottom Padded Kin
description:
Custom set of 6 Bridesmaids Gifts Handmade Large Pouch Clutch Flat Bottom Padded Kindle Wedding Make Up Travel Gadget Bags DESIGN YOUR OWN

My 'Design your own' set - Just in time for your Baby showers, wedding showers, bridal showers, bridesmaids parties...

* Note - my shipping cost below includes insurance in the U.S. *

I will design just for you a set of 6 pouch/clutches in the same fabric. 

Convo me your colors/theme & we will pick that one perfect print for the clutches! The newest or vintage prints! Also stop by my sold items to get some fabric selection ideas:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/hoganfe/sold

- the flat bottom stands alone
- soft light padding adds comfort & stability
- lots of uses perfect size for clutch, makeup, baby, school,ipod, camera, travel, kindle,netbook,gadgets...


My handmade large or medium roomy fun pouch measures approx.
9 inches (22.86cm) wide
6-7 inches ( 17.78cm ) tall/height when folded
2-2.5 inches (6.35cm) deep/flat bottom gusset

View more of my flat bottom pouches:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/hoganfe?section_id=6894938
http://www.etsy.com/shop/hoganfe?section_id=6507599


Upon receipt of your payment your order will be completed in 10-14 business days. If your fabric selection needs to be ordered I will need an additional 5 business days to complete your order.

Each bag is designed and handmade by me using the very finest quality fabrics. My meticulous attention to details assures you an outstanding bag!

worldwide shipping!

Thank you
mary
